user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and I want to create a playlist with songs that everyone will enjoy. Fetch the lyrics for the top 10 songs in different genres on Spotify, including pop, rock, and country. Also, provide the album metadata for each song.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top 10 songs from Spotify in the genres of pop, rock, and country.
For each of the top 10 songs, fetch the lyrics.
For each of the top 10 songs, fetch the album metadata.
